entities.name: detention
entities.description: Detention is mentioned as a consequence for giving out sweets. The text states 'No — come on, Hermione — we can’t tell them off for giving out sweets...'.

entities.name: dolores
entities.description: Dolores is the teacher who is standing up and looking furious. She says 'No, I’m sorry, they’ve gone too far.'

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of the students who is trying to play for time. He says 'I — what?'

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who is standing up and marching directly over to Fred and George. She is concerned about the students who are unconscious.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of the twins who are holding clipboards and observing the situation.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is the other twin who is holding a clipboard and observing the situation.

entities.name: nosebleed nougat
entities.description: Nosebleed Nougat is one of the sweets that Fred and George are giving out. Hermione mentions it as 'bits of Nosebleed Nougat or — or Puking Pastilles or —'

entities.name: puking pastilles
entities.description: Puking Pastilles is another type of sweet that Fred and George are giving out.

entities.name: fainting fancies
entities.description: Fainting Fancies is a third type of sweet that Harry suggests might be the cause of the students' unconsciousness.

relationships.description: Hermione is scolded by Dolores for giving out sweets.
Ron follows Hermione as she stands up and marches over to Fred and George.
Fred and George are twins who are holding clipboards and observing the situation.
